column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////What made this different from say
column3: is that it's thinner and much less cheesier than their pizza
column4: with more tomato sauce and a more buttery crust. So if you want a big thick cheesy pizza
column5: you may want to try other places
column6: but if you want a flavorful balanced pie you should definitely try this place. Also
column7: a size Large here is much smaller than a size Large at Giardano's.
